1.title: The Bumble Wars
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: The D*** Pic Debacle
1.plot: Charlie gives out her phone number and doesn't get what she hoped for.

2.title: The Ultimate Excuse
2.plot: Meet the office nemesis Margaret. A busybody with hilarious expressions and comments, she exists solely to annoy Ollie. Who is trying to tell Charlie about her perfect excuse to get out of a date when Margaret strikes.

3.title: The Office Nemesis
3.plot: Charlie receives the most hilarious pick-up line via Tinder and Ollie doesn't get it. And the office nemesis Margaret makes an appearance.

4.title: The Hangover Burrito
4.plot: Tinder can be a tricky place, especially if you decide that you're going to go on a mid-week date with a new guy. Two words, hangover and burrito.

5.title: The Tiny Handed Suitor
5.plot: Sometimes you REALLY like a guy. He makes you laugh, he makes you happy - but your best friend is concerned, because you know what they say about guys with tiny hands..

6.title: The Potential Threesome
6.plot: The more you Tinder the more your expectations and excitement for the person grow. And our girl Ollie is a sexually forward being who is ok with his wife joining in the fun too.

7.title: The Worst Date Ever
7.plot: There is nothing worse than a first date involving one of three things: his parents, fast food, and inappropriate touching. Well Charlie is in for a doozy of a date.

8.title: The Boyfriend Incident
8.plot: Sometimes when you go on Tinder dates, you get guacamole slung on your dress. Ollie recounts another Tinder date gone wrong, an unfortunate thing that seems to be happening to her often. Her loss is our hilarious gain. Especially when her co-worker Margaret chimes in with her incredibly insulting reasons for the date gone awry.

9.title: The Spanish Seduction
9.plot: Charlie is open to some Latin seduction even though she needs Ollie to translate every message. And poor Ollie is losing The Tinder Games and Charlie hazards a reason why, which the delightfully blunt Margaret just HAS to chime in on.

10.title: The Size Queen Romeo
10.plot: Charlie is open to some Latin seduction even though she needs Ollie to translate every message. And poor Ollie is losing The Tinder Games and Charlie hazards a reason why, which the delightfully blunt Margaret just HAS to chime in on.

11.title: The Love Disease
11.plot: Charlie is sick, and Ollie can't resist teasing her about it. Also, an important PSA. Also, find out how Frances' wife has time to make all those treats for the office. YOU WON'T BELIEVE IT.

12.title: The Tampon Bay Bucks
12.plot: Charlie and Ollie are modern career women, but what happens when you need a tampon and accidentally ask your new male co-worker for one. And your best friend is sleeping with him. :/

13.title: The Big Reveal
13.plot: An unbelievable thing happened, Ollie and Charlie are both dating guy (THAT THEY ACTUALLY LIKE!) at the same time. Miracles happen. And we all know miracles come hand in hand with tragedies. This time for Margaret.

imdb.plot outline: The 13-episode modern office comedy follows the story of two co-workers and best friends who are looking for love on Tinder, but don't always get what they bargained for. As they send and receive inappropriate Tinder messages at work and recount the previous night's dates, they must deal with their hapless boss who is constantly trying to feed them, and their desk mate and office nemesis Margaret.
imdb.title: The Tinder Games
plot: The 13-episode modern office comedy follows the story of two co-workers and best friends who are looking for love on Tinder, but don't always get what they bargained for. As they send and receive inappropriate Tinder messages at work and recount the previous night's dates, they must deal with their hapless boss who is constantly trying to feed them, and their desk mate and office nemesis Margaret.
